record.dc:title: 21MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 38MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 38MG31 - Village. Feature 22, Postmold floor pattern of a dwelling house with central hearth and pit. Square 11L17. Direction northeast.
record.wpa:narrative: Village site to the west of earthwork 37MG31. Structure rectangular with West side slightly longer. Fire basin small, round and deep with flat burned clay, circular area around it - "posthole fireplace." Pit in NE side 0.9' deep - top of pit at same level as firebasin. No evidence of daubed walls - structure probably not burned. Structure lay just under plowline and resting just above basic clay. Firebasin 0.7' deep.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution.
